name: Claude Marketing
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's marketing knowledge work plugin
long_description: This agent helps marketing teams generate and refine concrete campaign concepts, audience-specific message variants, and content plans that align to measurable goals, enabling faster creation of briefs, email sequences, and multi-channel strategies. Teams can use it to audit brand voice and positioning, produce clear, consistent copy across formats, and develop competitive and SEO-informed briefs to guide execution. It also supports planning and tracking performance by generating actionable report outlines and recommendations tied to campaign objectives. Outputs are intended to accelerate decision-making, reduce iteration cycles, and improve clarity and consistency across marketing activities.
